contact.contact.display(request)[source]¶

display contact form

Parameters:

request (object) – object contain context of request
Variables:
  • errors – dict of process error
  • success – dict of success process
  • dump – dump to request.POST for set email whaen user log
  • form – contain struct of contact form
Returns:

HTTPResponse
